parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database whose shards you want to query.

parameters.name: DbNamePattern
parameters.description: The matching pattern of the database name.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance whose database shards you want to query.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of database shards returned on each page.
